mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_audition_application (member_profile_id, apply_etc, audition_id, confirm_status) VALUES (#{memberProfileId}, #{applyEtc}, #{auditionId}, #{confirmStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS auditionId FROM tbl_audition a WHERE a.id = #{auditionId}

select aa.id, aa.audition_id, aa_mp.profile_name, a.audition_field, aa.confirm_status from tbl_audition_application aa join tbl_audition a on aa.audition_id = a.id join tbl_post p on a.id = p.id and a.id = #{auditionId} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile aa_mp on aa.member_profile_id = aa_mp.id order by a.id desc limit #{mySettingTablePagination.startRow}, #{mySettingTablePagination.rowCount};

select count(*) from tbl_audition_application aa join tbl_audition a on aa.audition_id = a.id join tbl_post p on a.id = p.id and a.id = #{auditionId} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile aa_mp on aa.member_profile_id = aa_mp.id

select a.id, a.audition_field, a.audition_career, a.expected_amount, a.audition_deadline, a.audition_personnel, a.audition_location, a.audition_status, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.created_date, mp.profile_name, mp.profile_email from tbl_audition_application aa join tbl_audition a on aa.audition_id = a.id join tbl_post p on a.id = p.id and p.post_type = #{postType} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile aa_mp on aa.member_profile_id = aa_mp.id join tbl_member aa_m on aa_mp.member_id = aa_m.id and aa_m.id = #{memberId} order by a.id desc limit #{myAuditionPagination.startRow}, #{myAuditionPagination.rowCount};

select count(*) from tbl_audition_application aa join tbl_audition a on aa.audition_id = a.id join tbl_post p on a.id = p.id and p.post_type = #{postType} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile aa_mp on aa.member_profile_id = aa_mp.id join tbl_member aa_m on aa_mp.member_id = aa_m.id and aa_m.id = #{memberId}
